== Highlight of Hirlam 7.1 alpha 3-newsnow ==

Hirlam 7.1 alpha 3-newsnow is the update to the previous tagged version of the "newsnow" development branch,   [wiki:ReleaseNotes7.1alpha2newsnow Hirlam 7.1 alpha2-newsnow] and in phase with the last update of the trunk version toward [wiki:Hirlam_7.1 Hirlam 7.1], i.e., [wiki:ReleaseNotes7.1alpha3 Hirlam 7.1 alpha3].

The current tagged version is mostly a technical one, with the most important changes on the corrections for previously reported problem of mean sea level pressure, (changeset [4737]). The [https://hirlam.org/trac/log/branches/newsnow/hirlam?action=stop_on_copy&rev=4785&stop_rev=4736&mode=stop_on_copy&verbose=on other changes ] are shared with those featured in the update for  [wiki:ReleaseNotes7.1alpha3 Hirlam 7.1 alpha3], as described in the [wiki:ReleaseNotes7.1alpha3 Release notes for 7.1alpha3].
